name: 80s Pop Music Quiz | Music by Year | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did the song 'Sunglasses at Night'?
Who did the song 'Saved by Zero'?
What artist had a hit with the song 'The Loco-Motion' during the 1980's?
questions.explanation:
Kylie Minogue.

	Little Eva did it in the 60's, Grand Funk in the 70's and the Village People should have done it in the 90's but missed their chance.

questions.text: Which of the following songs was NOT recorded by A Flock of Seagulls?
options: Wishing ( If I had a Photograph of you)
questions.explanation:
Irag.

	An easy one to following the spelling one.

questions.text: What movie did Toni Basil (who did the song 'Mickey') do the choreography for?
questions.explanation:
American Grafitti.

	She's also done the choreography on 'That Thing You Do' and 'My Best Friend's Wedding'.

questions.text: According to Billboard, what was the Number 1 song in the United States in the 1980's?
questions.explanation:
Physical.

	Yes, it's was Olivia's ode to working out.

questions.text: Who are Annie Lennox and Dave Stewart better known as?
Who did the song 'She Blinded Me With Science'?
Nena had a top 40 hit called 99 Luftballons, what does the word Luft mean when translated from German to English?
questions.explanation:
Air.

	Even though when the song was translated into English they changed it to "Red" but the actual translation is "Air." Had to have at least one tough one on the quiz.
